packages.name: Import Labels Plugin
packages.description: A plugin to import net, global, hierarchical, or text labels from a CSV or TXT file into KiCad schematics.
packages.description_full: The Import Labels Plugin for KiCad allows you to import net, global, hierarchical, or text labels directly from a CSV or TXT file into your schematics. It supports placing labels in a grid format, with options for choosing label types and handling duplicates. Ideal for automating schematic design and improving workflow efficiency.
